headline: Awesome
reviewBody:
Few months ago, if I had to introduce myself, I would say I am assistant professor working in an engineering college with a burning desire to become an Associated Professor. But sadly, never had time to focus on studies because of my 7am to 7pm job.
Then came the pandemic followed with a lockdown which brought me back to home for all day, I must tell you, this is time when I felt what I was missing out of life and that was my family time.
But again, money matters soon after lockdown the salary started dropping off from 100% to 50% to 25% and then even got delayed by months.
Like every other engineering student who has the habit of trying to answer viva questions even if the definition asked for sounds like Greek and Latin, I also thought of trying Whitehat jr.
This is where the turning point came in, with the flexibility of choosing your own timings and the amount of support and respect I got here. It been the best job ever.
1.	I could spend a lot of time with family after years of being labelled as a professional career oriented woman, now I am completely family person and I am truly loving it.

2.	I could finally concentrate on my dream of becoming an Associate Professor by pursing PhD and dedicating at least 10 hours of my day to studies.

3.	I can tell for sure what I am earning here is two to three times more than what I earned through my full-time job i.e., getting three months salary just by sitting at home and teaching little kids. The best part is I can increase or decrease my slots each month and accordingly my salary changes.  So, when I have an exam, I can reduce timings by just few clicks, no running behind the higher authorities to just get 1 CL of month.

4.	The world of white hat jr has extremely supportive people who are always there to help you. As soon as I joined, I was given a Mentor, a RM and off course the tech team. Even if the mouse isn‚Äôt working, I can text and there‚Äôs someone there to fix it up.

5.	The students are the best part, I always dealt with engineering students, here I got the chance to meet kids who are enthusiastic to learn with there bright eyes and smiling faces, they truly make my day. I have kids from around the world like US, UK, Australia, Philippines, Canada, Singapore, New Zealand and off course my country India and through this platform I am getting to learn the culture of various other people.

6.	The curriculum has been designed in a way that it completely follows a practical approach, So, I could actually see the kids learning to code, creating apps and games and adding their own creativity, unlike the college agenda of just obtaining theoretical knowledge for getting good grades in test. And surprisingly I am also learning quite a lot of new things through the webinars that are conducted for the teachers.

So, all in all It has been a great experience and Yes, it is too good to be true. But mark my words 
‚ÄúIT IS TRUE!‚Äù

headline: The Trust & Support
reviewBody: Punctuality is an important metric in WhiteHat Jr for the teachers. Even being punctual for all the classes, my punctuality% was going down, I guess, due to few system glitches at the back end. However, when I raised my concern with my RM, Prathmesh Soni, the WhiteHat Tech & Concierge Team, they supported me completely and have understood my concern, the most important point is, they all have shown trust in me. With their support, the error has been rectified and my punctuality is back to 100%. Thank you, Team WhiteHat Jr!!!

headline: Whitehat jr has become a great boon for me.
reviewBody:
Whitehat jr has become a great boon for my life.  After my BE education I was struggling hard to get a job for my skills. So I was trying to expand my skills in hoping that I will get a good job. Finally I was offered a job where I started it with excitement. Later it became a very long day of work where I had very less time for myself and my family, they were expecting me to learn new skills where I was not interested in and there was no gap for me to showcase my skills. That was the time I realized I needed to find an opportunity where I could showcase my skills and help others . In search I found whitehat jr and I applied for a job, which is really a unique company for showcasing built-in skills of women. My parents have 3 daughters and no one working at home, two sisters are married, i wanted to help my family financially so i don't know how many companies i travelled to get jobs, but finally god made me a member in this beautiful company where i am happy with work, as well i am supporting my family financially as well spending enough of time with family.

	  As well its a very great platform for kids to showcase their talent as well they play and learn coding, and we give them enough space to explore their creativity and there by they will improve their thinking capacity and their way of thinking also get wider, which improves there thinking capacity, logical thinking etc. I want to whole heartedly thank Jayshree Patel mam, Raj sir, Priyanka Thapliyal¬†¬†mam, Amanpreet kaur mam, Hasan Abidi sir and all other family members for their support. As well a big thanks for our whitehat jr family founder Karan Bajaj sir.

headline: Flexible Credible Humble
reviewBody: I have recently joined whitehat but the support I receive whether technically or any other personal work is quite amazing.The flexible working hours and salaries are quite satisfactory.Also the growth and Skill development is worth appreciating.

headline: The best decision of life is rebuilding my professional life with WhiteHat jrs.
reviewBody:
Thank you so much to this amazing educational organization, which helped me to rebuild my life. Thank you so much to this amazing educational organization "WhiteHat Juniors", which helped me rebuild my life and to come out of my early life in sobriety while I did not have a job post-delivery of my baby. 
* This platform is the best if you want to regain your educational knowledge on computer science and also want a traditional job where there is financial stability too. 
* This job gets you overwhelmed working full time with these amazing kids worldwide since they are spreading globally. 
* Minimum guaranteed amount of salary is assured every month based on your availability on this platform. 
* Promotions and incentives are purely based on your performance in the org. 
* If you are an introvert, this platform helps you in becoming the best communicator since we are allowed to teach the smart brains who are innocent at hearts. 
* Along with communication and teaching skills, you will be given great opportunities to improve your skills by self-learning and training with LMS. 
* Daily ongoing webinars on every classes where you can discuss and clear your queries with other amazing experienced teachers in the platform.
* 24/7 you will be supported by amazing tech team members when you are both in class and also offline the classes to resolve your side and student side tech issues. 
* Safety check and alerts options provided to help teachers to report inappropriate situations while live classes, 
* Your work will be always appreciated and recognized and a high chance of promotions if performed well. 
* Supportive RMs and mentors to guide you in the platform 24/7.

headline: My journey at Whitehatjr
reviewBody: My mother and I are victims of domestic violence. As a victim, safety was my first priority and I needed a work from home job to provide for my mom and me. I came across Whitehatjr on Facebook. Even though it seemed too good to be true, after watching a seminar video of the CEO of Whitehatjr Karan Bajaj and several other videos of Whitehatjr channel, it gave me the confidence to apply. Now I feel that that was the best decision I made after escaping from my abuser and my journey with whitehatjr as a teacher took off. Now I am proud to say that I am a survivor of domestic violence and thanks to whitehatjr. To all the women who want to be financially independent this is a wonderful professional platform. The training session and support from manager, mentor, technical team, personal concierge help you throughout your journey. Become a part of the beautiful family of Whitehatjr and fulfill your Dreams. All the best

headline: I love coding and teach coding
reviewBody:
I love coding and teach coding. I believe coding can be taught to kids.

The curriculum is very interesting as it focuses on the student applying the concepts learned by doing projects and not be restricted only to the academic curriculum.

Making students learn to code by game development is an interesting way for them to learn.

The entire system of Whitehat Jr is very good. The support is excellent at each level. The mentors, RM, webinars, help desk team, and the senior teachers are very helpful.

The flexible option of work from home and choosing the time is very good. During this pandemic time, this has helped me a lot.

headline: I am working with WhiteHat jr as a‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
I am working with WhiteHat jr as a professional level teacher. WhiteHat jr is best in the market to work from home and I as a teacher feel really lucky that I've got opportunity to work with them.
WhiteHat jr is the blessing for me during this period of pandemic. Schools were not behaving fair with teachers in terms of pay scale and it was difficult to survive until I found WhiteHat jr.
WhiteHat jr supports in every query and guides through the growth in terms of profession as well as monetary terms. They assign RM and mentor to help through any queries or obstacles we face.
WhiteHat jr recognises the work and appreciate for the same. They provides us the flexibility of working hours according to our schedule which helps to manage work and home as well. WhiteHat jr have best pay scale in the market which not only helped me to survive in this pandemic but also I'm supporting my parents and my family.
I'm really grateful to WhiteHat jr and would recommed others to join as well.

headline: WhiteHatJr is a fun place to work at
reviewBody:
WhiteHatJr is a fun place to work at. The job is not at all stressful,my RM is extremely supportive and my colleagues are great mentors as well as wonderful friends,the best part of the job is that I've increased my knowledge, improved the ability of dealing with parents and kids in different situations as well as my skills of communication,learning how to work with more confidence and courage.The culture at WhiteHat is by far the greatest asset and to work at. You can tell that they truly care about the happiness of their employees. It's a really relaxed and calm environment, even though the work we do can be fast paced. I never dread coming into work place every day, it has even helped me in these areas that are ,It has increased my independence.
Less expenses.
Increased productivity.
Improved technical skills.
Improved communication skills.
More work flexibility.
No office distractions, etc. As well as I am looking forward to go a long way with the company thank you.

headline: Awwesomeee
reviewBody: I joined WHJr about 2 months back and trust me I had no idea, that I'll be enjoying my job so much. I joined WHJr because I love coding and wanted to explore more but the kind of love and respect I got here was beyond my expectation. I have some amazing students who brighten up my day and their innocence and purity is what amazes me. I look forward to teaching them. My trial students too make my day when they ask me, "Ma'am If I enroll, will you be teaching me??" and when I reply positively they give me this full toothed smile which makes me love my work even more and pushes me to do better. I even remember one of my students fighting with sales representative to not book my last slot with someone else and to have it reserved for her. I have a good rapport with my student's parents as well. Apart from this I love the support provided to teachers by the management. My RM Sneha Ma'am was the one who solved every problem of mine with such ease. The technical team and the sales team are very fun people to work with. I had an amazing time with WHJr so far and I know will continue to have in  future as well.

headline: Best Indian Ed-Tech Platform!
reviewBody:
WhiteHat Jr is in its truest sense the best Ed-Tech Platform out there. In my very positive experience working here, I am given the respect of being a teacher, there are no expectations of sales targets, just quality deliverance of Education for the students. Your working hours, your pay, your work-life balance, everything is under your control. More importantly, the work environment is so so positive that it ensures you have smooth and kind assistance throughout your journey. Their promotions are strictly performance based and your growth trajectory is completely your responsibility. They provide mentorship, a relationship manager and a 24/7 support so all you have to focus on is your teaching. 

Very grateful to have been selected at WhiteHat Jr.

headline: Whitehatjr follows rigorous selection‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Whitehatjr follows rigorous selection process for confirming teacher candidate. It starts with a telephonic round and them three demo rounds. These three rounds are like the training process to start session. Once you clear these round you will be assigned with the mentor teacher where you get training and guidance to take the class successfully . But actual training will be post selection.

headline: Great opportunity, Gods gift for needy..
reviewBody: I completed my MCA in 2004 and got married I used to have a dream that I should work in software Sector I tried after 10 years but I was not able to fulfill my dream as I don't have experience and  I was rejected for no reason , so I was depressed and I was not able to convince myself, and started searching for a  job, which will fulfill my ambition of doing job. Suddenly one day I saw the add from whitehat junior and have got an invitation for an interview. By seeing that I tried my level best in getting into the job and whitehat junior helped  me out and made me stand in front of  my dreams, from the day one I started  (Jan2020 ) and by this time I have completed 9 months, I am very much dedicated to my job and feeling joy to  teach students and in this pandamic time people wear  jobless but God (Whitehat) gave me opportunity to my life , thought it is a god's gift and  working for  8 to 10 hours in a day.  I thank whitehat junior from the deep of my ‚ù§ for giving this wonderful opportunity üôè üôèüôè

headline: Best place to Teach & Learn Coding for kids
reviewBody: One of the best things to work at WHJ is that Teachers can select their own timings as well as how much do they want to work in a week or a month! Your Mentor, RM, Concierge, Chat Support are always there 24x7 to help you out with whatever you need. The Additional benefit is that while teaching, teachers can also brush-up their skills and even get certified time-to-time for their amazing performance. The curriculum is designed in a brilliant manner to keep the students engaged with fun and interesting activities which eventually make them great coders and mostly young entrepreneurs. Kids not just learn coding but it even improves their logical skills.

headline: Whitehat jr
reviewBody:
Pros- 
1-work from the comfort of my home 
2- time flexibility 
3- good interactive sessions with students makes your day 
4- fun learning and earning

Cons- 1-If the internet speed of student's system is checked before live session and they are informed about minimum speed required , there will be less NST ,hence more trial conversions for teachers 
2- if there is minimal amount taken for registration ,  only serious and sincere candidates will enroll , hence increasing trial conversions and decreasing the fake - id students.

reviewBody: Earlier I used to work in a school but due to Pandemic I had to quit my job. It really felt terrible to be jobless after working for years. Few months later I came across Whitehat junior teacher recruitment advertisement and I thought to give it a shot. I must say that it was the best decision ever. I got a job in Whitehat jr organization and it is going really well. I'm loving my job as it gives me financial independence and I can choose whichever time slot I want to work in.

headline: Incredible journey of teaching at Whitehat.
reviewBody:
It‚Äôs been an incredible experience teaching at Whitehat Jr where teachers are considered as the heart of the platform. I joined it on 1st June 2020 and since then there is no looking back.
Within 4 months of joining it felt great to have 28 paid kids spread all over the world and 400+ paid classes and tons of respect and love from parents and kids.
Everyone knows that teaching is such a noble profession, Whitehat gave me the opportunity to do it from the comfort of my home according to timings that suit me.
Never during my journey at even one moment I felt I was left all alone, there is a whole team to always back us up. We get so much support from everyone in the company which encourages us to keep growing, keep spreading happiness and knowledge.
After my marriage I thought my professional career had ended as there was no IT company in my city and Whitehat came to me as a blessing. I just feel so proud to say that I am a part of such a wonderful platform, which is giving females like me so much opportunity to be financially independent and at the same time spreading so much knowledge to young students who are the future of the world.

headline: Whitehat Jr - Where Expectations meet Reality
reviewBody:
Hello Everyone..
Greetings of the day!

I am Poorva, a teacher at Whitehat Jr.

In this pandemic where people were striving to find and stabilize their jobs, there was one company that welcomed the teachers open heartedly to join their network. 

It was WHITEHAT JR. 

In the modern era where there is so much advancement in the technology and services, Whitehat provides a platform to the students to make them technology expert at a very young age. 
WhiteHat Jr is the best Kids Coding Platform where kids are taught to code online by our expert teachers.

It is believed that a beginner is open for learning and grabbing new things easily. 
Coding is a basic literacy in this digital age, and it is important for kids to be able to work with and understand the technology around them.
Having children learn coding at a young age prepares them for the future. It helps children with communication, creativity, math, writing and confidence. It enhances their skills and be fit for the upcoming advanced life style and standards.

Whitehat helps students to build a strong pillar and a strong support for their family.

Apart from this, there are various things which are just awesome about Whitehat:

1. Flexible Working Hours : For women who deal with time management problems, Whitehat gives you flexible working hours where you can select your time by your own.

2. Financial Stability : I love the way Whitehat pays. In the world where teachers are paid less, Whitehat gives you an opportunity to earn 50K and more per month that too by working from home.

I'm Thankful to WhiteHat Jr for giving me an opportunity to join the team, pursue my teaching passion and building innovative skills in children.

headline: Experience at WhiteHat Jr
reviewBody:
The platform gives an awesome opportunity to work as a teacher and fulfill all your dreams. Being a teacher is my passion and in this pandemic I was successfully able to live my dream sitting at home. A fantastic work experience and a wonderful helping backend team always there to help and support you. The company provides you with incentives and certifications for your efforts. Reimbursements are also provided.


The free trials sometimes makes it difficult to work because a few students come without even the interest to learn coding. They come for time pass. This sometimes is disheartening as a techer as you may lose the spirit of teaching for that particular student and may not be able to give your best at times.

headline: WhiteHatjr is the best!
reviewBody:
Hi!

Greetings everyone!
Hope you all are doing great!

There are multiple things which are super awesome about WhiteHatjr.

1. Flexible working hours, I've my working hours from early 4:30AM to 7:30AM and 5:00PM to 8:00PM, suitable for all the educated women who want to work and use the experience.
The very thought of creating flexible working hours is so amazing,which creates
opportunities for women to work.

2. Supportive and cooperative Management, Teacher ops and Academic curriculum team. The work force is positively involved in supporting teachers from multiple dimensions, right from the curriculum to the tech support.

3. Approachable and transparent work flow.
Queries and feedback are accepted and taken care.

4.Promotions purely based on talent and hardwork.
Joined on Apr24th - started working dedicatedly for 7hrs, after 4months got promoted. Joined WHjr after completing B.Ed degree from BU and I'd prior exp of 8yrs in IT, passionate about innovation, I've two company registration patents from the previous company.

I'm Thankful to WhiteHatjr for giving me an opportunity to join the team and pursue my teaching passion and building innovative skills in children.

headline: My experience with Whitehat jr. Why I chose Whitehat Jr?
reviewBody:
During the pandemic one good thing that happened to me was Whitehat Jr. I graduated in July 2020, I started my journey with Whitehat in Aug 2020. The best part about whitehat jr is you get to earn and have satisfaction because you‚Äôre contributing towards the future generation.
When I graduated I had 2 offers in my hand, one as a decision scientist in a company and another was a teacher with Whitehat Jr. I thought a lot before choosing. Whitehat jr was focused on teaching coding to kids. I being a Computer Science Engineer know it very well how important it is to teach kids coding and in the right way. I was unsatisfied by the theoretical knowledge I got from school for coding/computer science. Because if Coding/Computer Science, if not taught practically is of no use. When I read about Whitehat jr and their teaching pattern I was highly impressed and wanted to contribute to get the kids right way of learning to code. Also, it was Work from home which was a bonus during this pandemic. Along with it, the policy of the company is simple ‚Äú the better you perform, the better you earn‚Äù which again encouraged me to choose Whitehat jr.

headline: Happy n highly satisfied
reviewBody:
WhiteHat Junior has played a very important role in my life. After marriage, I had changed my city and finding a job in a totally new city was very difficult. After so many struggles I finally got a job but not from the my field.Somehow I managed with the job but deep within I was not satisfied with that. In the course of time, all the offices were shut due to COVID-19, so I too had to stay home. In the meantime I got to know about WHJ and I registered for demo.I was excited for all the process included as it was from my field that is coding.Fortunately I got selected on this big platform and since then I am so much happy and satisfied with my job. Every sort of worry and stress goes away when you have to deal with kids. The amount of love your students pour your way is unimaginable.Today itself I received a promotion mail.Highly satisfied and working hard to achieve more milestones on this platform. 
Thank you WhiteJunior for everything.

headline: Teacher talks way too fast
reviewBody: Teacher talks way too fast.  Annoys child with constant yes? yes? yes? yes? yes? Runs over.  We have other things to do also. Class consistently runs 25% over -- we've complained but no results.

headline: Not "yet" enrolled, repelled by the crazed fictional assessment
reviewBody:
We have not "yet" enrolled for the classes. Given the modular structure we would have anyways enrolled the child for a certain number of classes. 

There seems to be this crazed zeal and push to "sell" their program, incl fairly weird assessments for children. I know my kid and was nearby when the trial class was on. The class was actually conducted well.. but the assessment was a very high rates review of my child ... which I know was now where near the truthful personality my child is. 

Now the only reason we are hesitant to enroll is coz of this ridiculously false exceptionalism of my childs performance. I know my child is good but not a genius the child is potrayed as. Another two parents who have tried seemed conned by this evaluation for their child ... 

I mean the conning really isnt reqd. They hv good faculty and a good model going. Why this "western pushy marketing" facade! Anyone who wants to do a trial class probably is in a 60% mindframe to enroll anyways. Really 3 whtsapp msgs, 2 emails, 1 call for a trial class ..... I was more engaged in the follow up for the trial class more than the eventual class itself. 

Again they seem to hv balanced teachers, there is no need to potray a child as a super achiever, that pushes the teacher to then lead the child to the work instead of letting the kid learn too.
seriously lay off the excessive mktg and window dressing!

headline: Holy aggressive marketing, Batman!
reviewBody:
I registered my kids for a trial class with WhiteHat Jr. 4.5 hours ago.  In the time since, I have received four emails, five text messages, and three phone calls reminding me of the upcoming class.  My husband has received the same (as they ask for a backup email and phone number), plus they also contacted him through WhatsApp.  My kids have not even taken the class yet, and at this point I am seriously considering cancelling because I am already over it.

UPDATE: We did end up taking the trial class, and it has changed my opinion somewhat.  The teacher seemed very knowledgeable and patient, and my kids really enjoyed working with her.  My husband did receive another message within less than a minute of us logging off though, so make of that what you will.

The bottom line is that we were pleased with the class itself, but the hard sell is a bit off-putting.

headline: Be prepared for a hard sell
reviewBody:
We took a trial class with WHJ several weeks ago.  While the class appeared to be fun and informative I have since been plagued by calls, texts and emails each stating that there is 'only one place left' on the next course! That my child was in the top 20% fo students etc etc.
I'm not sure about you, but doesn it seem funny that every message says there is just one palce left?  
I was very tempted initally by what WHJ offer but the marketing and recruitment strategy has put me off totally.  
Originally I came across them via a facebook ad which stated free coding.  What that really ment was a basic inital session which didn't last that long and was more of a drag and drop exercise.  They specifically ask for the parent to stay around and then do a big 20-30min sales pitch comes into play for their courses.  
I wish WHJ well, I really do but I do feel that there is a certain lack of integrity in their business modle that just doesn't suit our family.  
Reading the reviews most of them lack substance or relate to a completed course and some even appear to be about working for the company!!!!  I'm guessing the later is a ploy to re-estabilsh higher ratings after a poor review.  
I have rated a 3 star as I have not had the full experience with WRJ...nor will I ...we just did their taster session - which we enjoyed.  But for me this cold and hard recruitment technique lacks the substance that I look for when handing over my hard earned cash.

headline: Worth trying out
reviewBody:
I discovered Whitehat Jr through facebook marketing, while intrigued, I was doubly dubious about the course. I used the free assessment to gauge my 9yo daughters interest and her incredibly positive reaction made me decide to go ahead with a paid for set of classes.

I still had my doubts about how long my daughters interest will last, which has increasingly grown with each class. As an ex programmer, I have observed each of the classes so far and have found their methods very effective. Just yesterday they covered binary in a foundational way that is very sound.

Additionally, I thought there would be a communication challenge with accents, which has proven not to be a problem at all.

Paying for a bunch of classes up front made it seem  expensive, which when you break down this to a cost per class and realize that the tuition is 1 to 1, it seems a fair price to pay.

So, so far, I feel this has been one of my best investments in my daughters future. It remains to be seen how the rest of the curriculum goes, but if the net result is my daughter being extremely confident with computers, programs and looking at them as more than just gaming platforms, then it is a huge win.

headline: My wonderful experience with WhiteHat Jr.
reviewBody:
TRIED, TESTED AND APPROVED. üôã

Sharing my yesterday's experience with WhiteHat Jr. with all the parents üôÇ

I booked a free online coding class for my 9year old child for 1hour yesterday (18th September 2020).

The class was great. 
The online teacher was well-equipped with the knowledge and understood my child's mentality so well that she was able to complete the course in stipulated time frame. The co-ordination between them in just 10-15min was excellent.
The study concept and material are designed in such a way that for the child it feels like he's playing a drag-n-drop puzzle game while he learns everything.

Parents are allowed to join the class and sit beside the child throughout the class which I did, and are allowed to interact with the teacher if needed.

The complex concept of coding/programming goes inside the young child's brain so smoothly was unbelievable for me. My child too enjoyed the class thoroughly and even after that for 2.5hrs engrossed with the coding/software link sent by WhiteHat on the email id.
The class was far more superb than my expectations.üëçüèª

After the class, I understood one thing for sure, the way WhiteHat is providing technical education to kids is really innovative than any future college or institution would do for the child.

Internet data used was less than 1GB on a Hotspot.
No charges at all for the free demo class. 
You just need a Computer with internet connection & an email id. 

I advice and request you to book at least the demo class for any child present at your home or recommend the demo class to anyone with a child between age group 6 and 14 at their home, because it costs nothing and pays a lot.

Regards üôèüèª
Anju Jaiswal.

I have sent multiple emails but, never got a response from the so-called support team. My son was enrolled this summer (2020) we are not happy with WhiteHatJr. Our overall experience was not good I wish I could rate them zero stars.

WhiteHatJr now wants to contact me ü§Ø. Just because they saw my review! What happened to those 10+ emails and WhatsApp messages that I have sent and never heard back from you guys? 

Everyone I‚Äôm in IT Industry for 17+ years I have never seen such a fraud company rip off children especially in Education. 

Please DO NOT enroll your kids. It‚Äôs waste of time and money.

So, here I‚Äôm with some updates!

10.7.2020 UPDATE!

So, a guy name Jayesh contacted me on 9.22.2020 and asked me to forward him my concerns regarding this review which I did and he promised that he will take care of the problem I had with WhiteHatJr today is 10.7.2020 and I have not heard back from Jayesh even though I follow up with him the only reply I get back is ‚ÄúI have forwarded your concerns to the upper management‚Äù

headline: This was a desauster to make a‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
This was a desauster to make a appointment with the company, they used all resources to remind me the appointment day and night time every second hour, I was on duty in hospital and later tried to sleep but this nonsense didn't stop. Problem was the recorded massages and I couldn't request them to stop it. I was feeling like a mentally disabled person who has dementia and needs to remind 2 hourly. My God..... there is no option to cancel the appointment, it's only a option delay to next day.comming calls are recorded and can't be answered.
You replied that because I was unavailable for the class therefore,  you sent me a couple of messages. My dear company,  I  explained the conditions before I decided not to attend the classes. Couldn't bear that terror.

headline: Doesn‚Äôt work - sales and marketing focus over real learning
reviewBody: For my 6 year old, it has been frustrating to learn coding online and heartbreaking for me to see him struggle, try his best and understand. The technical glitches, constant calls at odd hours from different Whitehat employees and the sales and marketing push is just too much. The course has been designed for 6-15 years old and that‚Äôs too generic a description. He did the 8 classes program and I will not be moving forward or recommend this to younger children.

headline: I would like to start by saying‚Ä¶
reviewBody:
I would like to start by saying Whitehat Jr is doing an excellent job along with the collective effort by all the teams! Coding is the FUTURE!! Teaching kids coding not only shapes their future irrespective of the profession they choose.. but also helps increase their logical thinking and abstract thinking! It increases their ability to solve complex problems. I think as a part of Whitehat collectively all of us are doing a very noble job, by shaping the future of our next generation, as they are the ones who will further develop and shape our nations and in-turn the entire world. The future of the nation, and the world lies in the next generation's hands. Science will advance, technology will improve. Eventually using coding/technology in all sectors is what will be the most beneficial and Whitehat is preparing them for that, and also changing their outlook and mindset! Which is amazing! I am proud to be a part of this beautiful journey!
We are not only teach coding, but we make great coders and great people in all sectors with wonderful outlooks!

headline: A blessing for new mothers who can't pursue a regular office job
reviewBody:
Whitehat jr is one of the best platforms for women who are unable to do a regular office job. I had to leave my previous job in IT sector because of personal reasons...and recently i came across the ads on fb that whitehat is recruiting teachers. Initially i thought that it is simply a spam and didn't pay much attention...because it was too good to be true..but still one day i applied casually and then i totally forgot. After a month maybe I got a call for interview and within 15 days I became a member of whitehat teaching community. I work just 4 hours a day... 1 hr in morning ..2 hrs in evening and 1 hr at night.
I am actually earning as mentioned in the ads..almost 40k...and more than that I have enough time for my baby and family now. I am so lucky to be a part of whitehat community.

headline: I would say a job of your DREAMS üå∏
reviewBody: Its quite a good experience to be in Whitehat as a Teacher. I am enjoying teaching kids a lot. However, i should appreciate team's efforts too for trying to develop the platform at every step which is ofcourse a good thing. However, these frequent changes are making lot many teachers disturbing to get settle down to the upcoming changes, which is making them loose focus on curriculum learning as well as Teachings. Also earlier, it was just a feedback call to the parent, but now again a lengthy process of filling the report card is added. My suggestion will be, updating report card is fine, but we can cut the phone call process as these report cards are sent to the parents too. Then why two processes? Also, now we are spreading world wide. I think, MG hours to be made 24 hors of window for all days. Only couple of suggestions, rest you guys are rocking and we tooüòäüòä I wish a best luck to Whitehat Junior for the upcoming future to be the best oneüòäüòä

headline: Something madee feel uneasy.
reviewBody:
We use my laptop for online lessons alot. 
I know the settings for it and know that the camera and microphone work. 
During this lesson the camera and microphone were showing unconnected, I started to feel suspicious, and then the tech support wanted to access the lap top to "fix" a problem I know to not be there. 
The teacher was nice enough, but then offered to do the same. It was all quite high pressure throughout no and made me feel uneasy so I asked to end the lesson.

headline: Love it!
reviewBody:
Learning.... Good.
Teachers..... Good.
Platform.....Good.
Customer service......Can do better.
Only negative is the continuous bombardment of email, call & messages from different people from the company.

headline: Phishing scam, not for me
reviewBody:
They continuously email and call you, such hounders. 
I signed up for two free trial sessions, my 8 year old had to decipher the english barrier the tutor was clearly struggling with to be able to participate  in  class. He enjoyed the class but I wouldn't sign him up, I think it would hinder his own english and grammatical/word choice, as he is still in an impressionable age. 

My 11 year old could overlook the english and was happy to attend and learn in class. 
The put off is the amount of phone calls (from different zip codes) and emails the company  sends you. 
And honestly I dont know what this company  could offer you that "coding combat" or "khan academy"  could not have given you for free or lower costs. 
I did ask around and out of a group of 40+ homeschoolers 1 mom recommended  this company. 
Another dead stopper for me was that every single positive review on the internet  seemed to be written by employees or family members. Really if it smells like fish, it's probably fish.

headline: This is just a scam. A fat scam.
reviewBody: This is just a scam. They claim to be 1#, says your child can earn up to "USD 50'000 of lifetime education". Yet you learn nothing from this, they're using a free website that anybody could access and learn something from with WAY better customer support. It seems when i entered my phone number that they forcefully made me subscribe to their newsletter. I never planned on it. Me nor my child can understand them. Don't waste your time on this. When they call FORCING my child to put on face cam. That's not ok. We don't have to always have face cam on. The only thing they were good at was making me unable to cancel the trial.  There's no option on cancelling it. If i don't return they start calling me.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME ON THIS. There are way better websites other than this. You can use free and GOOD websites with customer support that is ACTUALLY understandable. Such as:khanacademy. Unlike whitehatJR Khan Academy actually helps, they have video lessons and helpers. There are many courses unlike whitehatJR. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME, you may think this is fake. While  i have an deep description of this scam. I warn you again. Don't waste your time. Period.

headline: It's a phishing scam
reviewBody:
It's a phishing scam. I signed up my kid and in 24 hours received over 30 emails. They emailed me, text me and called me on WhatsApp repeatedly

Their emails are the exact model of a phishing scam. They send demands for payment you did not agree to, congratulations on chosing courses you never signed up for, etc

The free class is nothing particularly good and very definitely not worth the hassle of the fighting off the phishing scam that follows

headline: Learning and development of our child‚Ä¶
reviewBody: Learning and development of our child has always been the top most priority as parents, by just not educating him but also helping him learn skills which he was super interested in. Adhrit has always been interested in knowing  ' hows and whys' in everything and this stays the same in his fun life when it comes to gaming. During this pandemic we never knew that this can be made possible at this small age but a huge thanks to White hat junior for this wonderful opportunity with which my child has just not solved his curiosities but is now a game developer. The platform, the mentors, the learning process - everything is so personalized and creative that it never lets any child keep his curiosities unexplored and unanswered. Thanking White hat junior a million more times for helping my child love what he does and do what he loves.

headline: They tell you not to be late and then they never show up.
reviewBody: We got countless emails between signing up and the class that started less than 24 hours later.  We got three calls.  Two on the morning of the class reminding us not to be late and to log in early.  We logged in 5 minutes early as requested and waited for 15 minutes (so 10 minutes after the class was meant to start) and no one ever came on. It did give a number to call if no one showed up after 10 minutes of waiting, but i was too upset to call after we had been reminded so many times to be on time and then they didn't even care enough to show up themselves.  And based on the number of emails and calls, I got within a 24 hour period, I was afraid it would only be worse after we took a "free" class.

headline: Insistent for you to purchase
reviewBody:
My child took their trial class in June. Just before the class began, I received 2 phone calls, plus emails. I didn't answer the calls because my child was already logged in and ready to start. I figured they wanted to make sure the student was going to show up and the teacher's time will not be wasted.
My child enjoyed the class. The teacher was lovely. She explained things in detail. She even showed my child apps that past students created as final projects in the program. 
Immediately after the class I received a phone call from the US from a man who claimed that the teacher personally called him to say that my child was exceptionally intelligent in the class. The teacher was in India...she immediately called him less than 5 minutes after he had completed the class? I felt pressured to purchase one of their programs. I explained that financially I was not prepared to commit that much, being a single mother, plus being in the middle of the pandemic. I had until midnight to decide! Something didn't feel right. 
My child is smart, but he is no computer genius. The man tried to guilt trip me into thinking I was "taking away (my son's) dreams" by not making the purchase. He also spoke of kids who won Google awards and such.  I searched on the app store after the class and none of the students' apps that the teacher showed my child came up. Strange.
Yesterday I received another call from Whitehat. A man who stated he was Manager, or CEO, or someone high up. I can't remember the status he stated he had. Offered me a discount. He was pleasant enough, so I listened to what he had to say. As before, he stated that my child's teacher personally called him and that my child was exceptional, etc. I told him financially I was not prepared to make such a committment at this time. Again, the guilt trip of taking away my child's dreams. Excuse me sir, but you don't know what my child's dreams are. He seemed to try to convince me that this course should be a priority. Excuse me sir, but feeding my child is a priority. I thanked him for his offer and told him I'd contact them in the fall if I was interested. I was somewhat annoyed but wasn't overly bothered, as I thought that would be the last I would hear from them.  I was wrong.
I just received another call from Whitehat just now. I had to literally tell the man to stop talking several times as he continued on his schpeel as if he had said this a thousand times over. I had to hang up on him. 
Whitehat, I had given you respect, I had given you my time, I had given you my child's time. You have no right to guilt trip me into thinking I am not providing for my children just because I don't chose to pay for your high priced online courses. You don't know my financial and personal situations. You have no business to harass me and pressure me into making a purchase I already politely said 'no' to more than once. That is not only poor business practice; that is poor ethics, and poor judgement. Please stop with the phonecalls immediately

headline: Bad high pressure sales
reviewBody:
We originally got in touch with Whitehat Jr via a Facebook add. When I got to booking an appointment slot and seeing the price, my wife and I realised that we could not afford it.

Ever since then, Whitehat Jr have continuously sent text messages to me. When I reply with ‚ÄúEXIT‚Äù to opt out they text me the next morning with a different number. These texts come through with my daughters name attached and vary between 5:30am and 8:00am. Do not give them information unless you are serious as opting out of marketing is not an option.

Please remove my information from your system. Texting me every morning attempting to pressure me into signing up is very unprofessional, you also have my 8 year old daughter‚Äôs name attached to every text. 

This appears to be a very shady organisation.

CHECK OUT THEIR FACEBOOK REVIEWS TO CONFIRM. TRUST PILOT DO NOT REMOVE THIS REVIEW, I HAVE ATTACHED PROOF OF PHOTOS TO FACEBOOK AS I COULD NOT HERE.

headline: Something seems "off" about this company
reviewBody: I'm going to try be brief bc I personally hate reading long reviews... but, let me just say I had a bad feeling about this before we even started the class. First of all, we got several messages before the class even started all from different random numbers labeled "spam likely" on my phone- not a good sign. Secondly, I could hardly understand the voice message, so I was concerned upfront my child would be able to understand the teacher. The teacher greeted us and seemed fine, but was easily frustrated if we couldn't find things on the screen and was speaking to us in a way that wasn't totally pleasant. Why be a teacher if you don't have the patience to help a child? Its supposed to be fun- you can't rush them through it! Also, she kept calling my child (who is quite young) by the wrong name, which was very confusing for them and they had a difficult time understanding the teacher through the thick accent. And finally, I have a bad feeling that my computer might potentially be hacked through the screen sharing app that they were using, so... I abruptly ended the session. After reading some of the other reviews here, I am not surprised that other people had this same feeling/experience.

headline: My Experience with White hat junior while applying for instructor position
reviewBody:
I recently attended an interview in White Hat junior and I wanted to share my experience here. First, I will give an overall idea about recruitment process.
First round was a telephonic one, they asked about the my details and shared a pdf of 50 pages.  Next I had a technical setup call with the technical team. In that they checked my Laptop and network connection. 
After that they asked me to take 3 demo classes, in those classes one of the employee will act like a student. In the first demo class they needed to teach the first 25 pages from the pdf shared. Candidate should prepare next 40 pages for second demo then full document for the third demo.
Here come the points why I got a bad impression on White Hat Junior,
I had a short telephonic discussion to start with and I was told that if I gets selected then I should  take minimum 4 hours session per day. This recruitment is for US/Canada students so the timing will be 10.30pm  -7.30 am (IST-Night shift).
But in the first demo class the interviewer told me to take minimum 30 hr per week. 
In the second demo the interviewer mentioned that the classes should be taken in both Indian and US timing.
In the 3rd demo the interviewer asked me to take 40 hours per week.
The point here is that the three interviewers are having three different rules for the same candidate. I felt they have lack in integrity about the basic things. 
They will give you the document which you have to teach and you need to teach the students it within 45 minutes. I have around 3 years of experience in teaching and very passionate about it. But the experience I got it from this platform was very humiliating and valueless by questioning the ability of a person to teach students in a stipulated time. They want people who are like robots who complete the class within 45 minutes without even understanding what the student needs, in this 45 minutes we should interact with the student, make the student understand about student panel in the system, showcase prototypes that other students have done and also need to explain entire course structure with the parent. So, you can figure out how to make the above things covered in 45 mins.
They are focusing only on business not the basic quality of teaching. If you want to make the student understand then you need to spend more time. Different students have different ability of grasping things, so as a teacher we need to understand the pulse and teach them based on that. In those cases, we can‚Äôt stick on the time. At the end of the day, student should gain some knowledge as takeaway. White hat junior is focusing only on business.
I have a request to White hat jr, If you want to get students you do some advertising/give a separate class for parents don‚Äôt evaluate the teachers teaching capability.
So, if anyone is planning to attend White Hat Junior interview, You know how it works and decided if you need opt for this or not.

headline: The class was OK. But SPAM galore.
reviewBody:
The class was OK. My 8 y.o. son liked it. The company is Indian, so the woman tutor was in India. Her English was alright. We had received a voicemail from them prior to the lesson and the person was difficult to understand due to the heavy accent. During the class, the woman was friendly. Her instructions and explanations weren't great, but they were alright. I did like that after the class she didn't push anything on us. She just congratulated my son on completing the class and that was it. But after the class I was getting multiple automated SMS from the company advertising their classes. They had an option to opt out by typing STOP. I did that, got a confirmation that I was removed from the list, and kept receiving their messages like before. Typed STOP again, got another confirmation, and still the messages didn't stop. Did it a third time just to be sure, but yeah, there seems to be no way to unsubscribe from their SPAM. Had to block their number.

There are many free services with block programming for kids. I would probably recommend those over WhiteHat Jr, especially if you can sit with your kids and guide them a little. I was easily able to block WhiteHat's SMSs, and if you're able to do that too, there's no harm in trying their class. But it's not that useful and the messages are rather annoying.

UPDATE Jan 2021: When I sign up for services, I sign up with an email specific to that service. This way I can filter my email better and also know that if I get SPAM for that specific email, it's that service/company that sold my email. Well, now I'm getting a TON of SPAM from "The Motley Fool", "Iman from Keystone", "Daily Profits Team", etc., all sent to the whitehat jr email. Not only do these folks SPAM you themselves, they also sell your data. I would advise to stay as far away from them as possible.

headline: Outstanding Experience
reviewBody:
My kid (Amir) recently completed the "advanced course" of WhiteHat Jr, and it was an outstanding experience.

 We are Bangali, and my kid is not an English medium student. I told them to give us a teacher who know the Bengali language and be friendly with my kid. Fortunately, we got a perfect and well-trained teacher for him.

My kid enjoyed the course and learned a lot from the exercises. In my opinion, The curriculum of "advanced course" is kids-friendly and helps to improve the capability of thinking.

Thanks
